entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:15 AM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
